name: @uttam-official/datepicker
description: A lightweight, material-inspired datepicker with month-year view switching.
author: @uttam-official

scripts.build: npx esbuild src/index.js --bundle --minify --outfile=dist/uttam-material-datepicker.min.js  --format=esm && copy src\style.css dist\uttam-material-datepicker.css
